title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry the pancetta until crisp; add crushed garlic briefly, then remove from heat.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan together in a bowl.
Drain pasta, reserve some cooking water, then return pasta to the pot.
Quickly mix in the egg-cheese mixture and pancetta, adding a splash of pasta water to make a creamy sauce.
Season with salt and lots of freshly cracked black pepper. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.

title: Jollof Rice
summary: A delicious West African rice dish cooked in a rich tomato sauce.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy and golden breakfast pancakes served with syrup.
